ARPoint3DFilter Class Reference

#import <ARPoint3DFilter.h>

Inheritance diagram for ARPoint3DFilter:

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

(ARPoint3D) - filterWithInput:timestamp:

Detailed Description

This is the base class of all ARPoint3D filters.

Member Function Documentation

- (ARPoint3D) filterWithInput: (ARPoint3D)  input
timestamp: (NSTimeInterval)  aTimestamp 

This function takes a new input value, processes it and generates an output value. Child classes should override this function to implement useful filtering.

Parameters:
input the current value of the signal
aTimestamp a relative timestamp; this value is guaranteed to be greater than or equal to previously provided timestamps, but does not necessarily represent an accurate UNIX timestamp.
Returns:
the output of the filter.
